title: Sarai Madho
text:
Sarai Madho is a village in <a href="Singhpur%2C%20Raebareli">Singhpur</a> block of <a href="Rae%20Bareli%20district">Rae Bareli district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. As of 2011, its population is 1,212, in 219 households. It has no schools and no healthcare facilities.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Sarai Madho as comprising 4 hamlets, with a total population of 631 people (337 male and 294 female), in 149 households and 144 physical houses.
 The area of the village was given as 690 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
The <a href="1981%20Census%20of%20India">1981 census</a> recorded Sarai Madho as having a population of 761 people, in 171 households, and having an area of 280.04 <a href="hectare">hectare</a>s.
